"Segreto": "Hello... It's a pleasure to meet you..."
"If you aren't... Then would you like me to teach you?"
"Very well... Let me know if you're ever interested..."
"Each weapon has... its own hidden potential..."
"You can unlock this potential... by having your weapon treated with materials and a catalyst."
"So... you'll need both Ores... and Photons to catalyze them..."
"Here... I'll give you some of mine... Please go try it out at the Item Lab."
"All it takes is a weapon... and some Photon-catalyzed \"Ores\"..."
"I wonder what secrets... your weapons have hidden within them..."
"All that's left... is for you to uncover them..."
